00015 int main (int argc, char const *argv[])
00016 {
00017     try
00018     {
00019         // Load image form disk
00020         Image img(argv[1]);
00021

00023         Clip pressClip (img, 0, 0, img.rows(), img.columns());
00024

00030     }
